actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Federal Government should not give any Federal agency the power to postpone the date of Federal elections.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) the Federal Government should not give any Federal agency the power to postpone the date of Federal elections; and (2) the Secretary of Homeland Security should not act on the proposal submitted by Election Assistance Commission Chairman DeForest Soaries.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Federal Government should not give any Federal agency the power to postpone the date of Federal elections.
